name: Nansen Chess Club - The Tournament of The Knights

metadata.name: Battle Medal
metadata.description:
Dear noble Knight!  
You earned this medal as you have demonstrated to all of us how a mighty knight fights on the battlefield in Nansen's second chess tournament - "The Tournament of The Knights". We know how difficult to find time for these kinds of activities in such a dynamic and evolving environment. We hope this medal will remind you of good old memories. Stay as you are because you are a precious Knight!
